price: Àwọn tó gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, tí wọ́n gbé ìlú wọn jù sílẹ̀,¹ tí wọ́n sì fi dúkìá wọn àti ẹ̀mí wọn jagun sí ojú-ọ̀nà Allāhu, wọ́n tóbi jùlọ ní ipò lọ́dọ̀ Allāhu. Àwọn wọ̀nyẹn, àwọn sì ni olùjèrè.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَهَاجَرُواْ وَجَٰهَدُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡ أَعۡظَمُ دَرَجَةً عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū wahājarū wajāhadū fī sabīli al-lahi bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim aʿẓamu darajatan ʿinda al-lahi wa-ulāika humu al-fāizūna
